Class Color4b

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Color4b
extends Tuple4b
implements java.io.Serializable
    A four byte colors (mostly used for colors with alpha).

    specification 1.2, implementation $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    Kenji hiranabe
